title: Principles of Thermodynamics
description: In-depth analysis of thermodynamics principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Fundamentals of Classical Mechanics
description: Advanced exploration of classical mechanics covering current research and industry practices.

title: Intermediate Astrophysics
description: Advanced exploration of astrophysics covering current research and industry practices.

title: Applied Particle Physics
description: Advanced exploration of particle physics covering current research and industry practices.

title: Quantum Mechanics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in quantum mechanics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Advanced Condensed Matter
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in condensed matter. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Condensed Matter
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in condensed matter. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Special Topics in Quantum Mechanics
description: Comprehensive study of quantum mechanics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: ASTR 347 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Astrophysics
description: In-depth analysis of astrophysics principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
prerequisites: PHYS 314 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Astrophysics
description: Advanced exploration of astrophysics covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: PHYS 320 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Condensed Matter
description: In-depth analysis of condensed matter principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
prerequisites: ASTR 352 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Quantum Mechanics
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of quantum mechanics. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.
prerequisites: ASTR 360 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Classical Mechanics
description: Advanced exploration of classical mechanics covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: ASTR 336 and senior standing or graduate status
